Hamadryad Aspects.name: Hamadryad Aspects
Hamadryad Aspects.fullText:
Hamadryad Racial Utility Hamadryad Aspects

Drawing on fey magic, you call on your primal beauty and strength to thwart your foes.

Encounter
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Choose one of the following aspects each time you use this power. You gain that aspect’s benefits.

      Spellbinding Beauty: Every enemy that can see you grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

      Wooden Form: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
    Level 11: Resist 10.
    Level 21: Resist 15.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 22.
Hamadryad Aspects.flavor: Drawing on fey magic, you call on your primal beauty and strength to thwart your foes.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Choose one of the following aspects each time you use this power. You gain that aspect’s benefits.

      Spellbinding Beauty: Every enemy that can see you grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

      Wooden Form: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Body of Solid Oak.name: Body of Solid Oak
Body of Solid Oak.fullText:
Hamadryad Racial Utility 2Body of Solid Oak

Your body hardens to take on the strength and resilience of the mighty oak.

Daily
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude, but you also gain vulnerable 5 fire.

Sustain Minor: The bonus and the vulnerability persist until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 26.
Body of Solid Oak.flavor: Your body hardens to take on the strength and resilience of the mighty oak.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude, but you also gain vulnerable 5 fire.

Sustain Minor: The bonus and the vulnerability persist until the end of your next turn.

Wooden Sanctuary.name: Wooden Sanctuary
Wooden Sanctuary.fullText:
Hamadryad Racial Utility 6Wooden Sanctuary

You abandon your body momentarily to slip into a secret sanctuary, reappearing strengthened and rejuvenated.

Daily      Healing
Move Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be adjacent to a Medium or larger tree or other wooden object, such as a door or a table.

Effect: You can spend a healing surge. In addition, you are removed from play until the start of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, you return to play in the space you vacated or the nearest unoccupied space. Alternatively, you appear in an unoccupied space adjacent to a tree or a wooden object within 20 squares of your starting position.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 26.
Wooden Sanctuary.flavor: You abandon your body momentarily to slip into a secret sanctuary, reappearing strengthened and rejuvenated.

At the start of your next turn, you return to play in the space you vacated or the nearest unoccupied space. Alternatively, you appear in an unoccupied space adjacent to a tree or a wooden object within 20 squares of your starting position.

Spirit Form.name: Spirit Form
Spirit Form.fullText:
Hamadryad Racial Utility 10Spirit Form

Your physical form fades into a diaphanous vision that can pass through the solid world like a ghost.

Encounter
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You are phasing and insubstantial until the end of your next turn. In addition, you shift up to 2 squares.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 27.
Spirit Form.flavor: Your physical form fades into a diaphanous vision that can pass through the solid world like a ghost.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You are phasing and insubstantial until the end of your next turn. In addition, you shift up to 2 squares.
Spirit Form.effect: You are phasing and insubstantial until the end of your next turn. In addition, you shift up to 2 squares.

Feyborn Majesty.name: Feyborn Majesty
Feyborn Majesty.fullText:
Hamadryad Racial Utility 16Feyborn Majesty

As you reel from your foe’s attack, your fury creates a display of otherworldly light all but impossible to look upon.

Encounter
Immediate Reaction      Special

Trigger: An enemy attack bloodies you or hits you while you are bloodied.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you shed bright light to a radius of 5 squares, the triggering enemy grants combat advantage, and enemies take a -5 penalty to attack rolls against you.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 27.
Feyborn Majesty.flavor: As you reel from your foe’s attack, your fury creates a display of otherworldly light all but impossible to look upon.

Fey Mind Mirror.name: Fey Mind Mirror
Fey Mind Mirror.fullText:
Hamadryad Racial Utility 22Fey Mind Mirror

As you shake off an enemy’s control of your mind and body, you turn the tables by using its own power against it.

Daily
Immediate Interrupt      Special

Trigger: You are subjected to an enemy’s dazing, dominating, or stunning effect that a save can end.

Effect: You make a saving throw against the effect. If your saving throw is successful, the triggering enemy must make a saving throw against the same effect. If that enemy’s saving throw fails, the enemy is subjected to the effect (save ends). If your saving throw fails, you do not expend this power.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 27.
